resources.string:
"INSTRUCTIONS:

As a user, you can invite one of your friends to play this game with you. 
		• Both of you will see an image of clothing. 
		• You will give your answer (like /dislike) based on your taste. 
		• Your guest will guess your taste and give corresponding answer. 
		• If you two have same answer, you will get 1 point, otherwise, 0 point will be given. 

As a guest, you can be invited to play with one of your friends."
